**Changelog:**

**Version 2.0:**

- Updated Font awesome icon plugin.
- Updated Bootstrap and jQuery.
- Included minified version of font awesome icon css, bootstrap js and css to all html files. 
- Removed Google web font code from HTML files and added to style.css.
- Added charset meta utf-8 in all html files.
- Bug fix from scroll to top. (custom.js)
- Added a new page index-alt.html. (style.css)
- Fix the layout for 'catchy' block content in all html files. (style.css)
- Fix search input box and button to inline in aboutus page. (aboutus.html)
- Updated navbar dropdown style. (style.css)
- Client block updated from col-xs-6 to col-xs-12. (index.html, index-alt.html)
- Item block cloumn updated from col-xs-6 to col-xs-12, col-sm-4 to col-sm-6. (index.html, index-alt.html, items.html)
- Removed jQuery CaroFredSel plugin (Recent Posts or Whats new section) and added Bootstrap carousel. (all html files, style.css, custom.js)
- Removed unsed codes from custom.js. 
- Added documentation. 

**Version 1.4:**

- Catchy Block Subscribe from firefox fix. (style.css)
- Whats new block Carousel Firefox fix. (style.css)

**Version 1.3:**

- Removed unused JS and CSS files from coming soon page (comingsoon.html).
- Removed countdown JS code from custom.js file (custom.js).
- Added countdown JS code in coming soon page (comingsoon.html).

**Version 1.2:**

- Carousel Bug Fix. (style.css)
- Changed carousel images. 

**Version 1.1:**

- Carousel Bug Fix for Firefox. (index2.html & style.css)

**Verion 1.0:**

- Initial Release
